channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overflowing black bins on pavement, 21st January
item.description:
The black bins of number 31 and 35 are permanently left on the payment despite the fact that there is plenty of space in the front garden of those addresses. Rubbish builds up around the bins which can lead to a trip hazard and hygiene problems.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glenarm Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Masses of litter at Junction of Wellington Gardens and Church Lane, 21st January
item.description:
Bins overflowing and extra bags of rubbish left around Bin by Bus stop K in Wellington Gardens. Bin in Church Lane near Totty Pharmacy. Also bags of rubbish left outside Marsh & Parsons. There used to be a street sweeper in the vicinity nearly every morning but he has disappeared. This area is a tip.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wellington Gardens, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet
